title: DLI Routing Pattern
content: Three-tier routing: Pattern matching (FREE) → Cheap model → Expensive model. Optimizes cost while maintaining quality.

title: Universal Inbox Pattern
content: Single entry point for all file types. Watch directory → Classify → Route to appropriate handler.

title: Library System
content: SQLite-based knowledge management. Stores knowledge, decisions, patterns, achievements, and ALS runs.

title: Use SQLite for Library
content: Chose SQLite over PostgreSQL for library storage.
metadata: {"rationale": "Lightweight, no server needed, perfect for local-first architecture. Easy to backup and sync."}
